member.name: NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR
member.summary: The NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR enumeration type defines the router discovery behavior, as described in RFC 2461.

member.name: NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR.RouterDiscoveryEnabled
member.summary: Router discovery is enabled. This setting is the default value for IPv6.

member.name: NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR.RouterDiscoveryDhcp
member.summary: Router discovery is configured based on DHCP. This setting is the default value for IPv4.

member.name: NL_ROUTER_DISCOVERY_BEHAVIOR.RouterDiscoveryUnchanged
member.summary: When the properties of an IP interface are being set, the value for router discovery should be unchanged.
